short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add, subtract, multiply, and divide, gift cards
short.vi: Cộng trừ nhân chia, thẻ quà tặng

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simon Gift Card is an extension on the Chrome browser that helps users easily calculate and buy products from Simon Gift Card conveniently. This application is designed simply but effectively, allowing users to select the product and quantity they want to buy, then automatically calculate the total value to pay.

Main feature:

Product Selection: Users can choose from a list of offered products including:
- Book voucher 24476
- Gift card 5678
Enter Quantity: After selecting the product, users can enter the quantity of the product they want to buy.

Calculate Value: When clicking the "Calculator" button, the application will automatically calculate the total value to be paid based on the selected product and quantity.

Display Results: The calculation results will be displayed in a notification window, including the total value of the order.

Simple Calculator: In addition to calculating order value, the application also provides a simple calculator with basic functions such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, division.

The application was developed by Simon Gift Card, a unit specializing in gift card management. Quick contact at:
- Address: 211 Bergen St, Harrison, NJ, USA
- Phone: (+1) 833-345-1988
- Email: giftcardsimon85@gmail.com
